title: This is an example of short-circuiting: When any conditional access operation using the null-conditional operator evaluates to null, the entire expression evaluates to null immediately, without processing the rest of the chain.

inline_content.Text: This is an example of short-circuiting: When any conditional access operation using the null-conditional operator evaluates to null, the entire expression evaluates to null immediately, without processing the rest of the chain.

title: Null-conditional operator produces rvalue, not lvalue, that is, it cannot be used for property assignment, event subscription etc. For example, the following code will not work:

inline_content.Text: Null-conditional operator produces rvalue, not lvalue, that is, it cannot be used for property assignment, event subscription etc. For example, the following code will not work:

title: int? nameLength = person?.Name.Length;    // safe if 'person' is null
